definition: The word "vorne" refers to a location or position that is situated in the direction of the front or the forward part of something. It is commonly used to describe the spatial relationship of objects or people in relation to their surroundings.

examples.english: He is standing in the front
The book is lying in the front

examples.german: Vorne im Bus ist noch Platz
examples.english: There is still space in the front of the bus

examples.german: Vorne im Zug ist es lauter
examples.english: It is louder in the front of the train
